tractography package¶

Submodules¶

tractography.clean_tracks_done module¶

tractography.clean_tracks_done.clean_tracks_done(source_dir: str, pipe_name: str)¶

Warning : Function to delete file tracked.tck if sift was ran. Warning : if the pipeline is rerun, it will do again tracks generation.

Parameters:

  • source_dir (str) – parent folder of dicom directory

  • pipe_name (str) – name of the folder of the output

tractography.even_workflow module¶

tractography.even_workflow.execute_even_workflow(source_dir: str, rawdata_dir: str, derivatives_dir: str, subject_list: list, ses_id: str, templates: dict, **kwargs)¶

Workflow for diffusion MRI tractography and connectivity matrixes creation. Particularly adapted for subjects with 2PA/2AP

Parameters:

  • source_dir (str) – base directory

  • rawdata_dir (str) – path to nifti files

  • derivatives_dir (str) – chosen derivatives folder

  • subject_list (list[str]) – subjects list in the format [‘01’,’02’,’03’]

  • ses_id (str) – session id

  • **kwargs – keywords argument for specific pipeline parameters

tractography.odd_workflow module¶

tractography.odd_workflow.execute_odd_workflow(source_dir: str, rawdata_dir: str, derivatives_dir: str, subject_list: list, ses_id: str, templates: dict, **kwargs)¶

Workflow for diffusion MRI tractography and connectivity matrixes creation. Particularly adapted for subjects with 3PA/1AP or 3AP/1PA

Parameters:

  • source_dir (str) – base directory

  • rawdata_dir (str) – path to nifti files

  • derivatives_dir (str) – chosen derivatives folder

  • subject_list (list[str]) – subjects list in the format [‘01’,’02’,’03’]

  • ses_id (str) – session id

  • **kwargs – keywords argument for specific pipeline parameters

tractography.single_shell_workflow module¶

tractography.single_shell_workflow.execute_single_shell_workflow(source_dir: str, rawdata_dir: str, derivatives_dir: str, subject_list: list, ses_id: str, templates: dict, **kwargs)¶

Workflow for diffusion MRI tractography and connectivity matrixes creation. For single shell diffusion MRI data

Parameters:

  • source_dir (str) – base directory

  • rawdata_dir (str) – path to nifti files

  • derivatives_dir (str) – chosen derivatives folder

  • subject_list (list[str]) – subjects list in the format [‘01’,’02’,’03’]

  • ses_id (str) – session id

  • **kwargs – keywords argument for specific pipeline parameters

tractography.synth_workflow module¶

tractography.synth_workflow.execute_synth_workflow(source_dir: str, rawdata_dir: str, derivatives_dir: str, subject_list: list, ses_id: str, templates: dict, **kwargs)¶

Workflow for diffusion MRI tractography and connectivity matrixes creation. Particularly adapted for subjects without inverse phase

Parameters:

  • source_dir (str) – base directory

  • rawdata_dir (str) – path to nifti files

  • derivatives_dir (str) – chosen derivatives folder

  • subject_list (list[str]) – subjects list in the format [‘01’,’02’,’03’]

  • ses_id (str) – session id

  • **kwargs – keywords argument for specific pipeline parameters

tractography.tractography_utils module¶

tractography.tractography_utils.check_problems_nifti(base_dir: str, folder_name: str, templates: dict, session: str, group=None)¶

Get the list of subject that can be processed using the diffusion workflows

Parameters:

  • base_dir (str) – base directory

  • folder_name (str) – s

  • session (int) – session to be processed

  • templates (dict) – template for MRI aquisition

  • group (str, optional) – group of subject to be processed (either patients, temoins etc. )

Returns:

  • the list of subjects that can be processed

  • the list of subjects having dimensions issues

  • the list of subjects having template issues

Return type:

a tuple comprising

tractography.tractography_utils.check_template(base_dir: str, folder_name: str, session_id: str, templates: dict, group: str = None)¶

Function to get the subject list that attended to a specific session

Parameters:

  • base_dir (str) – base directory

  • folder_name (str) – name of the data directory (usually ‘rawdata’)

  • session (int) – session to be processed

  • group (str,optional) – group

  • group – Optional group to include in path

tractography.tractography_utils.extract_dim(pattern)¶

Explore nifti headers to search for a potential dimension error.

Parameters:

pattern – file path pattern for the nifti image to be analyzed

Returns:

  • a list of three int : dimension x,y,z

  • a boolean, True if the image has a dimension error

Return type:

a tuple comprising

tractography.tractography_utils.get_list_sessions(base_dir: str, folder_name: str, session: int, group: str = None)¶

Function to get the subject list that attended to a specific session

Parameters:

  • base_dir (str) – base directory

  • folder_name (str) – name of the data directory (usually ‘rawdata’)

  • session (int) – session to be processed

  • group (str,optional) – Optional group to include in path

tractography.tractography_utils.isEmpty(path: str)¶

Function to check if a directory exists and is empty

Parameters:

path (str) – path to folder

tractography.tractography_utils.workflow_repartition(base_dir: str, folder_name: str, session: str, templates, shell, group: str = None)¶

Get the list of subject that underwent session i and were aquired an inverse phase

Parameters:

  • base_dir (str) – base directory

  • folder_name (str) – folder name, usually rawdata

  • session (str) – session to be processed

  • templates (dict) – template for MRI aquisition

  • shell (str) – either ‘multishell’ or ‘singleshell’, require multishell for b != 0 > 1

  • group (str, optional) – group of subject to be processed (either patients, temoins etc. )

Returns:

  • list of subjects that check template

  • list of subjects that must go in even_workflow (multishell data)

  • list of subjects that must go in odd_workflow (multishell data)

  • list of subjects that must go in synth_workflow (multishell data)

  • list of subjects that must go in singleshell_workflow (singleshell data)

  • list of subjects that must go in singleshellsynth_workflow (singleshell data)

Return type:

a tuple, comprising

Module contents¶

sub module containing diffusion MRI tractography workflows
